parameters.query:
select distinct upper(enterprise_document_number) as enterprise_document_number, representative_email from hubspot.parche
#and rut_proveedor in (
#'77760001K')
#limit 0,3000
;

select core_user.id as representative_id,
       core_user.email as representative_email

from api_registry_common.core_user
         inner join api_registry_common.core_profile
                    on core_user.id = core_profile.user_id

select distinct upper(document_number) as enterprise_document_number,
                ce.id                  as enterprise_id
from core_enterprise ce
         inner join loans_loan l on ce.id = l.requester_id
         inner join loan_requests_loanrequest lr on l.loan_request_id = lr.id
    and l.state != 'canceled'
#and lr.requester_id=1498
    and
                                                    lr.created_at between DATE_ADD(
                                                            DATE_SUB(LAST_DAY(CURDATE()), INTERVAL 2 MONTH), INTERVAL 1
                                                            DAY) and DATE_SUB(LAST_DAY(CURDATE()), INTERVAL 1 MONTH );

update internal_requests_internalrequest ir 
set ir.representative_id = $1 
where ir.requester_id = $2 
and ir.created_at between  DATE_ADD(DATE_SUB(LAST_DAY(CURDATE()), INTERVAL 2 MONTH ), INTERVAL 1 DAY) and DATE_SUB(LAST_DAY(CURDATE()), INTERVAL 1 MONTH );

update loan_requests_loanrequest lr
set lr.representative_id = $1
where lr.requester_id = $2
  and lr.created_at between DATE_ADD(DATE_SUB(LAST_DAY(CURDATE()), INTERVAL 2 MONTH ), INTERVAL 1 DAY) and DATE_SUB(LAST_DAY(CURDATE()), INTERVAL 1 MONTH );
